content.stimulus_en: We (have) ________ learned many things.
How (be) ________ the final test?
She (be) ________ ready for the B1 level.
They (not/forget) ________ anything.
I (have) ________ finished the A2 course.
I (be) ________ very proud of myself.
I am looking forward to starting the next level.
Congratulations completing on the entire A2 course!
You are now ready to take the next step in your learning.
I achieved have all my learning goals for this level.
Don't forget to keep practicing your English every day.
This the is end of the final module of the course.
